survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Electric Skateboards Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors regarding the purchase and use of electric skateboards, including features, price sensitivity, and brand awareness.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with electric skateboards?
answer_options: Very familiar - I own or have used one extensively
Somewhat familiar - I have used one a few times
Not very familiar - I know about them but have not used one
Not at all familiar - I know little to nothing about them
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to gauge familiarity levels. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with electric skateboards?
answer_options: Very familiar - I own or have used one extensively
Somewhat familiar - I have used one a few times
Not very familiar - I know about them but have not used one
Not at all familiar - I know little to nothing about them

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you would consider purchasing an electric skateboard?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selects 'Very familiar' or 'Somewhat familiar' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional responses. Helps identify niche motivations.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text follow-up (SINGLE_CHOICE with conditional OPEN_TEXT for 'Other')

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you would consider purchasing an electric skateboard?
script.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selects 'Very familiar' or 'Somewhat familiar' in Q1

questions.question_text: Which features are most important to you when selecting an electric skateboard? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selects 'Very familiar' or 'Somewhat familiar' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture prioritized features. Limit selections to 3 to force prioritization.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with max selections (MULTI_CHOICE, max_selections=3)

script.question_text: Which features are most important to you when selecting an electric skateboard? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selects 'Very familiar' or 'Somewhat familiar' in Q1

questions.question_text: What is the maximum price you would be willing to pay for an electric skateboard?
questions.client_notes: Price ranges should reflect market segments. Consider mobile-friendly dropdown for smaller screens.

script.question_text: What is the maximum price you would be willing to pay for an electric skateboard?

questions.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about using an electric skateboard?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to uncover unanticipated barriers or fears. Useful for product development and marketing.

script.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about using an electric skateboard?
